Play.Header: NYG wins toss, elects to Receive, and PHI elects to defend the East goal.
2-D.Akers kicks 65 yards from PHI 30 to NYG 5. 85-J.Carter to NYG 36 for 31 yards (28-C.Buckhalter). Eagles' #78-Hollis Thomas, injured foot during warm-ups, will not return to game.
